thread.title: Kotoko management yet to be officially notified of Osei Kuffour's appointment as club's new boss
thread.title_full: Kotoko management yet to be officially notified of Osei Kuffour's appointment as club's new boss

title: Kotoko management yet to be officially notified of Osei Kuffour's appointment as club's new boss
text:
22:40 CET Kotoko management yet to be officially notified of Osei Kuffour's appointment as club's new boss - www.ghanasoccernet.com Kuffour is reported to have been appointed Kotokoâ€™s new Executive Chairman 
Asante Kotoko's current management insist they are officially unaware of the appointment of Samuel Osei Kuffour as the new Executive Chairman of the club. 
Fast circulating reports especially on social media on Saturday claim that Kotoko owner Otumfuo Osei Tutu II after several weeks of speculation has finally confirmed the ex Ghana defender as the Executive Chairman of the club. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
